spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified as having a strong 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit due to the gradual build in effort and rhythm mentioned in the description. The use of music tracks with Dance mid and Global Hits radio stations supports the musical pacing element, leading to a score of 0.7. 

'Outdoor & Adventure' is rated highly at 0.8 due to the natural setting shown in the image, indicating that the rowing session takes place outdoors, which fits this spirit perfectly.

'Structured & Disciplined' also plays a role, as the workout is described as a warm-up with interval format and technique reinforcement, suggesting a methodical approach, earning a score of 0.6.

Other spirits like 'High-Energy & Intense' and 'Soothing & Restorative' are excluded, as there is no indication of extreme intensity or a focus on recovery and relaxation.
